content: I am a software developer living in Istanbul/TURKEY.
I graduated from Istanbul Technical University Computer Engineering Department.
My favourite programming language is Python.
I prefer to use GNU/Linux systems and believe the idea of free software.
I love playing darbuka, taking photographs, and writing with fountain pens.
I do not want to work for military/destructive technologies.
I like to work on tools that help people more than making bosses richer(ideally).
